**Do you have a specific idea in mine? Please describe or share references.**
A clear an concise description of what you want. Ex. I'm looking for [...]

**Is what you're asking for similar to any other textures?**
If it is, please link the exported texture here, or it's ID.

**Do you have any specific colors in mind?**
If so, please list their _hex colors_ here.

**Any additional requests?**
Add any additional context or images about your hair request here.

**Do you understand that anything you request here is NOT a commission, and will be publicly accessible?**
- [ ] Yes, I understand that anything I request here is publicly accessible.
